parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - ListNBox

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the additional text (invisible) on the item with the given position of the 2D listbox.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>  [[lnbSetData]] [idc, [row, column], data]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [idc, [row, column], data]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> [row, column]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> row: [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> column: [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name>p6</name>=<value> data: [[String]] - The invisible text to add

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name> s2</name>=<value> ctrl [[lnbSetData]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[row, column], data]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> ctrl: [[Control]]
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[row, column], data]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> [row, column]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> row: [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name>p25</name>=<value> column: [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name>p26</name>=<value> data: [[String]] - The invisible text to add

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[lnbSetData]] [123, [0,0],"#1"];</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_ctrl [[lnbSetData]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[0,0],"#1"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[lnbSetTooltip]], [[lnbAddArray]], [[lnbAddColumn]], [[lnbAddRow]], [[lnbClear]], [[lnbColor]], [[lnbCurSelRow]], [[lnbData]], [[lnbDeleteColumn]], [[lnbDeleteRow]], [[lnbGetColumnsPosition]], [[lnbPicture]], [[lnbSetColor]], [[lnbSetColumnsPos]], [[lnbSetCurSelRow]], [[lnbSetPicture]], [[lnbSetText]], [[lnbSetValue]], [[lnbSize]], [[lnbText]], [[lnbValue]]
</value></part></template>
